nodes.text: Landing Bay Aurek was a hangar located in Mos Shuuta, a city on Tatooine. The Krayt Fang (the ship of Trex, a Trandoshan in the employ of Teemo the Hutt) was docked at this bay until it was stolen by a group of adventurers escaping from Teemo's Gamorrean thugs and stormtroopers loyal to Lieutenant Herkin, an Imperial commander with illegal connections to Teemo.
